title: Boundless Necromancer - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Calm Protagonist   Cautious Protagonist   Cheats   Determined Protagonist   Dungeons   Game Elements   Grinding   Level System   Loner Protagonist   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Necromancer   Overpowered Protagonist   Parallel Worlds   Poor to Rich   Secretive Protagonist   Skill Assimilation   Skill Books   Skill Creation   Special Abilities   Strong to Stronger   Sudden Strength Gain   Survival   Survival Game   Sword Wielder   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: SunWoon   선운
description:
I never thought I could become a hunter.

I never thought I would get the chance.

But that wasn't true. 

「 'Tower of Trials' has selected all suitable candidates from Earth. 」
「 Please select your difficulty. 」
「The chosen difficulty will be directly proportional to your rewards. 」

I was given a chance now.

A special one at that.>
